name: Angel Nodes
description: "AngeL Nodes, a DeFi Staking Protocol that brings sustainable yields, is designed to open the doors of the future of DeFi to anyone. The protocol will facilitate future developments to provide the community with sustainable Defi-as-a-Service. Our protocol provides you with a Node ecosystem where you can create your own Nodes to generate a daily income. Node Holders will get their rewards in our native token, the $AngeL. We will provide a long-term sustainable environment that incentivizes long-term investments. Yield will be farmed and redistributed in proportion to your Node Type. The protocol variable may change over time with industry conditions to ensure the health of the protocol. However, all yield will always be distributed back across these nodes acting as yield baskets which create a source of income."
